Sound Regeneration
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Monster Rancher DS: General QA: Sound Regeneration
By Damion Cross on Saturday, August 28, 2010 - 10:20 pm:

out of all the ways i think this will be the most reproducible

I do realize that all monster may not be regenerated through this method but i do think it is a start

in order to do this all things would have to be right, accurate, and reproducible

so i made my room dead silent created an audio file, placed the back of my ds to my speaker making it so my mic would be in the middle, turned my speaker to the max (an easy to achieve constant spot - the other constant spot is off), played the sound once, and i got golem 9/10 times, the 10th was aero (Pixie x Tiger)

here's the audio file: http://www.mediafire.com/?a7sazlkck7qi78i

please try and reproduce my experiment, this is the last factor, repeatability throughout others

steps:

1. make it dead quiet
2. turn speaker to max (afraid of this as all speakers may be created differently)
3. place ds with back to speaker (screens facing you)
4. play the sound file (BE SURE TO TURN DOWN THE VOLUME AFTERWORDS)
5. post result here please (try a few times....)
6. ???
7. Profit!
